communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: MKUltra Documents
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Documents relating to the MKULTRA, BLUEBIRD/ARTICHOKE projects as undertaken by the CIA primarily between 1951 and 1973. These have already been identified, as listed recently in a Requester Report in response to FOIA request, reference: F-2023-01896 (requested by John Heywood on 27th August 2023).

The document is available here: https://www.muckrock.com/foi/united-states-of-america-10/mkultra-151276/#file-1145109

In your response to Mr Heywood, attaching the requester report, you mention that a DVD has been compiled with the documents listed in the report. Please could I request a copy of that DVD.

If that is not possible, I would like to order copies of the following documents from the Requester Report: 

Mori ID: 20476 - 01/01/1978 - MKULTRA - INSTITUTIONAL NOTIFICATIONS; MKULTRA ADDITIONAL INSTITUTIONS NOTIFIED; MKSEARCH INSTITUTIONAL NOTIFICATIONS; BLUEBIRD ARTICHOKE INSTITUTIONAL NOTIFICATIONS; OTHER PROJECTS

Mori ID: 40176 - 12/11/1985 - ORKILOW VS THE UNITED STATES -CIVIL ACTION NO 80-3163 (DDC) DOC ALSO MENTIONS A LAWSUIT AGAINST THE CIA CONCERNING MEDICAL TREATMENT BY A DOCTOR WHO UNDER A GRANT FOR A CIA PROJECT CALLED MKULTRA SUPPOSEDLY PERFORMED TESTING ON UNWITTING PERSONS

Mori ID: 45517 - 11/02/1977 - UNTITLED DOC MENTIONS ON 26 OCTOBER (DELETED) AN EMPLOYEE OF THE (DELETE D) CONTACTED THE OFFICE OF THE INSPECTOR GENERAL HERE AT THE AGENCY AND RELATED THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION

Mori ID: 146143 - 07/01/1975 - (ESTIMATED PUB DATE) DISCUSSIONS OF MKNAOMI WITH (DELETED)

Mori ID: 146144 - 01/17/1958 - REPORT CONCERNING CERTAIN TECHNIQUES IN HYPNOSIS

Mori ID: 146150 - 01/02/1975 - PROJECT BLUEBIRD/ARTICHOKE

Mori ID: 146151 - 01/31/1975 - PROJECT ARTICHOKE

Mori ID: 146153 - 02/03/1975 - PROJECT ARTICHOKE

Mori ID: 146154 - 02/10/1975 - REVIEW OF PROJECT FILE DATED 5 FEBRUARY 1975; AND REQUEST FROM AGENCY OFFICIAL, FOR INFORMATION OF PROJECT FILE DARED 2 FEBRUARY 1975 WITH ATTACHED NOTE DATED 10 FEBRUARY 1975

Mori ID: 146157 - 01/28/1975 - INFORMATION FOR ROCKEFELLER COMMISSION

Mori ID: 146160 - 08/27/1975 - TERMINATION OF UNWITTING TESTING WITH BEHAVIOURAL DRUGS

Mori ID: 146164 - 09/15/1975 - MKULTRA/ MKDELTA

Mori ID: 146172 - 09/10/1975 - DISCUSSIONS WITH (DELETED) ON MKNAOMI

Mori ID: 146181 - 01/30/1975 - DISCUSSION WITH (DELETED) ON MKNAOMI

Mori ID: 146193 - 01/29/1975 - BEHAVIOURAL DRUGS
Mori ID: 146194 - 02/11/1975 - BEHAVIOURAL DRUGS AND TESTING WITH ATTACHMENT TITLED INFLUENCING HUMAN BEHAVIOUR

Mori ID: 146195 - 01/01/1975 - (ESTIMATED PUB DATE) (UNTITLED) RE REPORT ON MKULTRA PROGRAMS AND PRINCIPAL PARTICIPANTS

Mori ID: 146199 - 07/14/1976 - POSSIBLE MISINTERPRETATION OF TRAINING ACTIVITY BASED ON RECENT MEDIA DEVELOPMENTS

Mori ID: 146200 - 07/14/1975 - OVERSEAS TESTING AND APPLICATION OF BEHAVIOURAL DRUGS

Mori ID: 149543 - 10/13/1953 - (UNTITLED) RE ARTICHOKE PROBLEMS

Mori ID: 149545 - 11/25/1952 - PROPOSED RESEARCH - ARTICHOKE

Mori ID: 149546 - 12/06/1956 - LETTER TO RESEARCHER (NAME DELETED) RE ARTICHOKE

Mori ID: 149547 - 02/08/1957 - LETTER TO (DELETED) RE HYPNOSIS

Mori ID: 149622 - 01/01/1952 - (ESTIMATED PUB DATE) (UNTITLED DRAFT) RE TEST A NEW ARTICHOKE TECHNIQUE

Mori ID: 149617 - 01/14/1952 - BLUEBIRD - ARTICHOKE, PROPOSED RESEARCH, WITH COVERING MEMO

Mori ID: 149620 - 01/01/1952 - (ESTIMATED PUB DATE) (TITLE DELETED) RE LIST OF QUESTIONS RELATED TO ARTICHOKE DRUG TESTING

Mori ID: 173526 - 08/15/1972 - FIVE MEMOS RELATED TO ADMINISTRATION OF MKULTRA PROJECTS DATED 1971 - 1972

Mori ID: 173869 - 07/26/1973 - MULTIPLE DIVISIONAL REVIEWS: BEHAVIOURAL ACTIVITIES/ BEHAVIOURAL SYSTEMS/ ANIMAL (26 JULY 1973); BEHAVIOURAL ACTIVITIES/ BEHAVIOURAL SYSTEM/ ANIMAL CAPABILITIES (26 JULY 1973); & BEHAVIOURAL ACTIVITIES/ CONTROL/ MANIPULATION (27 JULY 1973)

Mori ID: 173875 - 01/01/1973 - (ESTIMATED PUB DATE) MISSION & HISTORY RE BEHAVIOURAL ACTIVITIES OF THE (DELETED) DIVISION  

Mori ID: 173876 - 03/05/1973 - MIND-BEHAVIOUR CONTROL

Mori ID: 173972 - 07/21/1968 - BEHAVIOURAL PROGRAM (A BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF METHODOLOGY)

Mori ID: 184467 - 01/27/1955 - TWO MEMORANDUMS TITLED: ‘PSYCHIATRISTS REPORTS ON THE ARTICHOKE OF (DELETED) AND (DELETED)’

Mori ID: 184471 - 06/21/1953 - ARTICHOKE TECHNIQUES - (DELETED) AND DELETED

Mori ID: 184479 - 07/07/1955 - ‘BRAINWASHING’

Mori ID: 190872 - 12/20/1954 - UNTITLED MEMO RE IDEAL MATERIAL FOR ARTICHOKE TREATMENT

Mori ID: 295456 - 07/14/1978 - LETTER TO (DELETED) FROM (DELETED) RE STEPS AGENCY HAS TAKEN TO IDENTIFY PERSON WHO MAY HAVE BEEN SUBJECTS OF CIA SPONSORED DRUG TESTING

Mori ID: 295459 - 10/24/1978 - MKULTRA SUBPROJECTS 7, 27, 33 AND 40 (DELETED)

Mori ID: 295476 - 06/05/1979 - LETTER TO TED MURCHECK FROM DON L WORTMAN RE IDENTIFY PEOPLE WHO WERE GIVEN DRUGS WITHOUT THEIR CONSENT

Mori ID: 295498 - 10/09/1979 - MKULTRA/ NOTIFICATION OF UNWITTING SUBJECTS - ADDENDUM TO THE FINAL REPORT

 Mori ID: 295567 - 01/12/1979 - MKULTRA NOTIFICATION PROGRAM (W/ATTACHMENTS)

Mori ID: 295568 - 07/02/1979 - MKULTRA NOTIFICATION OF UNWITTING SUBJECTS - FINAL REPORT (W/ATTACHMENTS)

Mori ID: 295569 - 04/25/1979 - MKULTRA NOTIFICATION OF UNWITTING SUBJECTS (W/ATTACHMENTS) 

Mori ID: 298284 - 10/24/1978 - RECORDS ABOUT DRUG EXPERIMENTATION (W/ ATTACHMENTS)

Mori ID: 298287 - 03/09/1979 - (UNTITLED) MEMO RE SEARCH FOR VICTIMS OF CIAS DRUG RESEARCH

Mori ID: 313408 - 02/07/1975 - 02/07/1975, ALLEGED ILLEGAL DOMESTIC ACTIVITIES (PROJECT ARTICHOKE); 01/31/1975 PROJECT ARTICHOKE 

Mori ID: 404531 - 10/01/1979 - (EST PUB DATE) SEARCH FOR PERSONS WHO WERE UNWITTING SUBJECTS OF CIA DRUG RESEARCH PROGRAM - THE INVESTIGATORS REPORT (W/ATTACHED ROUTING SLIP)

Mori ID: 442307 - 01/01/1900 - (EST PUB DATE) NON-GOVERNMENT RESEARCHERS, WORK LOCATIONS AND/OR INSTITUTIONAL AFFILIATIONS MENTIONED IN SUMMARIES OF RECENTLY RECOVERED MKULTRA SUBPROJECTS 

I request that I be properly classified as a news media requester. I am a journalist and producer for a podcast production company and I am requesting this information in that editorial capacity.

Blanchard House (https://www.blanchard-house.com/about) is recognized for producing narrative podcast documentary series, reporting and publishing regular series on issues of public interest and importance, such as the below examples:

Black And Blue - blanchard-house.com/releases/blackandblue
Pirate of Prague - https://www.blanchard-house.com/releases/nwfei4clq9mes1v8n3hacvrt3tkpi0

In addition, I have worked as a public service journalist during my career, and plan to use my editorial skills (honed as a producer for the BBC for nearly 20 years) to analyze and produce original reporting work for our podcast audience, who listen to our programmes on platforms including Wondery, Apple podcasts or Audible. 

Examples of some of my previous journalistic work are here:
BBC Radio 4 - Putin’s Religious War - https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/m00162mp
BBC Radio 4 - The Unabomber - https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b07654x0

If you have any questions about my media status, please contact me.


In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. 
If the DVD is not available I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Rebecca Maxted
